full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GCIG TU BRAL GYI RNAM BZHAG LEGS BSHAD RGYA MTSO LAS BTUS PA'I 'KHRUL SPONG BDUD RTZI'I GZEGS MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @043A *, ,CES GCIG TU BRAL GYI RNAM GZHAG BDUD RTZI'I GZEGS MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI LHA LDAN SMON LAM CHEN MO'I GRVA SKOR BA AA LAG SHA NGAG DBANG BSTAN DAR GYIS BGYIS PA YIN NO,, ,,ZHES PA 'DI NI DAD BRTZON SMAN PA DGE SLONG SKAL BZANG DANG DGE SLONG BSTAN 'PHEL DANG PAR DPON DGE SLONG BLO BZANG TSE RING SOGS KYIS ^KHU RE CHEN MO'I ^KUN DGA' CHOS GLING DU DPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'O, ,PAR BRKOS PA PO DGE SLONG 'DGE 'DUN NO, ,
